item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: So, has anyone tried to wander for a whole con?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Then seems like my not-meeting-this-free-TtW is personal fail/unluck till more-less recent (like few monthes I regulary have a bunch of them) :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I can confirm that, I've gotten free TtW even before I got the keycard.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I have a feeling that any Wander has a chance of giving TtW.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I've got both today:

Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, 20+ Cool, With The Flow
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+30 Silence XP
You got Time to Wander!

Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, 20+ Cool, With The Flow
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+30 Silence XP

I have thoughts that Mondo Keycard give chance of TtW :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Fun variant:

Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, 20+ Cool, 30+ Cool, With The Flow
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+30 Staring XP
You got Time to Wander!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
"Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Time To Wander, Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, 9+ Cool
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+15 Cosplay XP"

Ma cosplay is 4 too so maybe McM changed this wander in any way. Edited page so it tells like u have chance for more than 15 xp.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
"Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+15 GeoSense XP"

And my level is 4… Hm… Whatever xD

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: No problem, I like the wiki a lot. I'll help point it out when I find something missing or wrong, as my part in it.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Spent some time looking through bvs ecansol base and found that wanders with "You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!" All mentioned at page stats have 15, 20 and 30 xp. All exept staring have 40 xp (4th lvl of staring really hard to obtain btw). 50 for dance, drama, flip out, vid. 60-140 (every 10) has only dance and flipout (didn't find 130 flipout but it's not really matters :) ). So this info sounds like right for all mentioned at page stats :) Thanks a lot, Stain, for helping our wiki ^_^

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I found info that flip out also on this multi-lvl-effect, I'll fix this on page tomorrow :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, With The Flow
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+360 Dance XP

My dance level is 36 now, so it's dance level * 10 for dance xp.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Then I'll try for some analyse in the nearest future:) *writting something into copybook*

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: ⑨, Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, 9+ Cool, With The Flow
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+340 Dance XP
You got Time to Wander!

I think it used the modifier, level of skill times 10. My dance is level 34. I didn't see it on the page in the wiki.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Time To Wander, Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, Fighting Headband, 9+ Cool, Full Cosplay
You spar with a fellow warrior!
+15 Wake-Up Reversal XP

Words are different maybe from the headband.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Con Suite/Super Hungry, Glowslinger + Prime Target, Full Cosplay
You watch a Glowslinging duel from afar!
+30 Alpha Cancel XP

At my last post were just +5 XP but without Glowslinger, only Prime Target :) Interesting what combination can bring +15 XP then…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I've seen 5, 15, and 30, and haven't been able to tell what makes the difference.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: Time To Wander, Con Suite/Super Hungry, Prime Target, 9+ Cool, Full Cosplay
You watch a strange glowstick fight from afar!
+5 Guard Crush XP

But at this page +15 is written. Need to be checked.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Modifiers: Time To Wander, Glowslinger + Prime Target, Master of Disguise + Full Cosplay

I got 30 The Angles exp rather than 15…maybe having glowslinging and prime target doubles it?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: ⑨, Con Suite/Super Hungry, 20+ Cool, With The Flow
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+40 Videogaming XP
You got Time to Wander!

Did con suite do this? The normal effect on 20+ cool wanders is +50 XP, but no free TTW…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Con Suite = Mondo Keycard I guess. I'm getting that effect with 3 nom, so it must be. >.>

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: ⑨, Con Suite/Super Hungry, 20+ Cool, <2 Sleep
You give someone a tip on a cheap shuttle in the Con Suite!
+3 Monies

Were 0 nom - became -1 after a wander. But still what meens Con Suite, that can be used instead of low Nom?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I just another modifier that's not up here.

"Con Suite/Super Hungry"

I had a suite at the Hotel, and 1 Nom. All I got was the evil convention monkeys one from my low sleep, but it was a new modifier to me.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: You seem to get random times to wander at the end of the con, but it could simply be because it's "With The Flow". I haven't done a lot of testing, but I usually end up saving my Flow for the end of con wanders (since they don't eat up any extra time) so that could be it.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Wandering Encounter
Modifiers: 9+ Cool, With The Flow
You read an interesting article in the Con Booklet!
+20 Drama XP
You got Time to Wander!

anyone have an idea what caused me to get the TtW? This was at the last minute of the con…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
You count people on a bus, get confused, pass out, and the clock's wands whirl!

When i got this wander, i got +3 sleep, but i also got a free "Time To Wander".

Is this the same for the other (9) effect? Is it possible to not get the free TTW?

item.title: Baka Badge
item.content:encoded: Besides the 2 wander events does it do anything else?
